
\begin{\VAR{ float_type }}[\VAR{ float_placement }]
\BLOCK{ if float_type == "table" }
\protect\caption{\VAR{ float_caption }\label{\VAR{ float_label }}}
\BLOCK{ endif }

\centering
\VAR{ float_content }

\BLOCK{ if float_type == "figure" }
\protect\caption{\VAR{ float_caption }\label{\VAR{ float_label }}}
\BLOCK{ endif }
\end{\VAR{ float_type }}
